column2: This is a world with different ph-ph-physical parameters, C-Captain. *Gordon looks surprisingly happy.* Have you noticed the difference in perception yet?
I think… I did. It is very unusual. Everything is so… smooth.

Yes. Which is why w-we have to k-keep moving. Also, I d-demand a ban on going out to space, and also that you d-don't let anyone come close to the ship. The scanner picked up s-some creatures in the distance. They're b-being aggressive.
Gordon, how do we get out of here?
We have to s-study the space. I'm sure we will find a way.
I sure hope so. We have some hard work to do. Over and out, Gordon.
